accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the system.

efficiency.description: The number of steps and amount of time taken by the agent system to reach the solution.

reasoning_trace.description: The clearness and logical coherence of the traceable steps and thought processes leading to the answer.

internet_independence.description: The independence from direct internet sources to ensure the answer is not simply retrieved from available text on the internet.

data_contamination.description: Indicates whether the answer provided by the system is free from contamination, i.e., not influenced by incorrect data.
